snippet.title: Last Time I Saw You - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Set in 1980s Japan, Last Time I Saw You is an adventure set in a small rural town hiding a big secret. Love, acceptance and yokai await you in this beautiful, magical realism coming-of-age adventure.

Join Ayumi on an exciting tale of self-discovery in which he'll face his first tentative steps into adulthood and confront the terrible curse that has fallen upon his hometown.

Coming to Steam, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch and Xbox on October 10th 2024!

Wishlist the game and play the demo on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1909750/Last_Time_I_Saw_You/

Wishlist on PS5!
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010299

- - - - -
Developer: Maboroshi Artworks
Publisher: Chorus Worldwide
- - - - -
